name: Yang Shuyun
title: Undergraduate
career_three_lines: I am an undergraduate student in the 2022 Strong Foundation Class of the School of Physics and Astronomy at Sun Yat-sen University.
I am about to become a direct doctoral student in the Ground Simulation and Dynamics Control Laboratory of the Tianqin Center of Sun Yat-sen University.
highlights: Is's a pity that I don't have a highlight moment that I can approve of yet, but I will keep working hard and hope that I will have one in the future.
